profile.description: The profile of the created Farm. For HTTP farms is http.

farmname.description: Farm descriptive name. It is used as a unique identifier.

vip.description: IP of the farm, where the virtual service is going to run. The indicated IP must be configured in the system and UP

vport.format_msg: It expects a port number or multiport value for L4xnat farms
vport.description: Port of the farm where the virtual service is going to listen. The same virtual port and virtual IP must not be in use by another farm.
vport.depend_on_msg: Mandatory if the profile is not datalink, else it is not expected

copy_from.description: This parameter expects the name of a farm that exists. If this parameter is sent, the farm is copied from the farm specified in it. The farmname, vip and vport values will be overwritten.
